name: Walstikski
description:
Walstiki
The best stupid game of the century
Walstiksi is a new game where you go through multiple very hard level to find and achieve the donut. Some might say that Walstikski is the hardest game they have ever played.
Throughout the game you have many different parkour levels, ranging from fun and very hard droppers, to fun and very hard normal parkour. The game will be updated soon to having a multiplayer, more levels added, and a story mode.
Do You Think You Can Beat The Game..... Cause I don't.
